title: [Large-scale] Mobile-based collaborative learning design platform for social education projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (ability to use fundamental smartphone functions)
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for elementary education administrators/leaders in designing social studies-linked projects. Conducting learning design collaboration using only smartphones in non-PC environments

learning_goals: Collaborate with a team of three or more to draft a social studies-integrated microlearning project using a learning design collaboration platform
Store, retrieve learning design resources in mobile environments, and exchange real-time feedback with peers
Develop a design proposal incorporating three or more interaction strategies to enhance learner engagement using collaborative learning design tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
